attributes.action: Call an end on unnecessary detentions in Future Academies schools.
attributes.additional_details: Pupils at Future Academies are stressed beyond limit trying to keep up with the constant change in rules. We would like you to help our pupils. My son in particular is constantly stressed and isn’t enjoying being a teenager and I know this is how the majority of children across the schools feel.

rejection.details: Decisions about when to give students detentions is a matter for individual schools or academies, not the Government or House of Commons. You can read the Government's guidance on school discipline here: https://www.gov.uk/school-discipline-exclusions
